creator: jubelo
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Areaedit{x here / new (area name) / reload

{Wareaedit here:{x
     This will start editing the area you are currently in.

{Wareaedit new (area name):{x
     This begins editing the new area named (area name).
     
{Wareaedit reload:{x
     This saves and reloads the area you are in.

{WAvailable options while editing an area:{x
     {Bname{W:{x Sets the name of this area.
     {Bauthor{W:{x Sets name of the builder for this area.
     {Bplane{W:{x Sets the plane this area resides in.
     {Bhometown{W:{x Sets this area as a hometown for a particular race
     {Bdifficulty{W:{x Sets the listed difficulty for the area.
     {Balignment{W:{x Sets the alignment for this area, if there is one.
     {Blocationx{W:{x Sets the x location for the wilderness map.
     {Blocationy{W:{x Sets the y location for the wilderness map.
     {Bvnumlow{W:{x Sets the low vnum for the area.  {W({RBE CAREFUL!{W){x
     {Bvnumhigh{W: {x Sets the high vnum for this area. {W({RBE CAREFUL!{W){x
     
{WSpecial Notes:{x
     {RYou must 'populate' when in the editor as soon as the other options{x
     {Rare configured!  This creates the first room in the area as a{x
     {Rplace holder.  You can then type 'done' to finish the area creation.{x
